title: Vampire Knight: Noir no Wana
original_name: ヴァンパイア騎士〈ナイト〉凝黒の罠
sinopse: Three short stories are contained in this novel. In the first, we see the events leading up to Zero's decision to attend senior high school. The second features Shindo-san—the girl who tried to give Valentines chocolates to Zero in the beginning of the manga. The last features the class rep.
